as the name suggests  the Mazda 3 is a mild hybrid. A small lithium-ion battery drives a motor generator that produces extra torque and power. This is primarily used to help the car accelerate slightly more quickly from a standstill. However  note that the Mazda is not a pure hybrid car (like a Toyota Prius)  and it is unable to run on battery power alone.
